ygData.subject: Re: Monk Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Blackpearls are also dropped by griffins and griffons I have looted 2 pearls one from an avocet and one from a griff. might just be easier for you to buy one
ygData.messageBody:
Blackpearls are also dropped by griffins and griffons I have looted 2 pearls
one from an avocet and one from a griff. might just be easier for you to buy
one than to find one. only use the gold bp choker dont bother with the
rings. if you want jeweler made rings get some emerald platinum ones with
the srt/dex stat ups
----- Original Message -----
From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 12:30 PM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Monk Questions


> From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>
> Black pearls come from Aviak Avocets right? I have killed all the
> avocets I really want to kill and have never gotten a black pearl.
>
> How rare of these suckers?
>
> Also, Quillmane seems to have some decent Monk equipment, do you
> take a faction hit for killing him? The equipment is no_drop.
>
> >
